monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Cuts through vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, it gains a Shield equal to 5% of its Maximum Health and 1 Charge stack.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Aqua Blast
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Armor Crush
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Armor Break on an enemy, 40% chance to spread it to another enemy.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Brawn over Brains
skills.description: If this Monster would gain Sorcery (Buff), it gains Might (Buff) instead.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Corrosive Assault
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 40% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff) - 40% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Break
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Critical Healing
skills.description: Healing actions can land a "Critical Heal" to heal for an increased amount, based on Critical Chance and Critical Damage. (Triggering any Crit-based skills)

skills.name: Critical Liquid
skills.description: Water attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Divine Shield
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, it gains a Shield equal to 5% of its Maximum Health and 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Forceful Might
skills.description: Unique Aura: Might also makes all attacks ignore 10% of enemy's damage reduction.

skills.name: Fortress
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (350 + 30% Defense) Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Gigadrill
skills.description: 6 x 100% (600%) physical damage (neutral) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Long Slash
skills.description: 1 x 160% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Long Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 21. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Multi Armor Break
skills.description: Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Phalanx
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Phalanx Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Phalanx Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Pinch
skills.description: 2 x 175% (350%) physical damage (neutral) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Pinch Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 215% (430%) physical damage (neutral) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Pinch Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 265% (530%) physical damage (neutral) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Precision
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 20% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Relentless
skills.description: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Shared Might
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Might (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Might.

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Situational Support
skills.description: When this Monster uses a non-damaging action for the first time in combat, apply a random Buff on all allies and shield them by 20% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Splatter
skills.description: Aura: When an enemy is knocked out, spread half of their Bleed stacks to the remaining enemies. (rounded up)

skills.name: Water Affinity
skills.description: Water attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Water Allegiance
skills.description: Converts the element of all Neutral attacks to Water. Water attacks ignore water resistance.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Water Surge
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (water) applies Might (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Water Surge Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (water) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Weapon Break
skills.description: Unique Aura: Enemies with Armor Break (Debuff) get their Critical Chance decreased by 10%.
